mapper.select: SELECT u.NAME, ti.NATIONALITY, ti.INFO, ti.LIKE, ti.PROFILEIMG, u.INTEREST1, u.INTEREST2 FROM USER u INNER JOIN TUTOR_INFO ti ON u.USER_ID = ti.TUTOR_ID WHERE u.USER_ID = #{tutorId}
SELECT * FROM TUTOR_CLASS WHERE TUTOR_ID = #{tutorId} and CLASS_DATE = #{classDate}
SELECT u.NAME, r.REVIEW_CONTENT as reviewContent, r.REVIEW_DATE as reviewDate, r.TUTEE_ID as tuteeId FROM REVIEW r INNER JOIN USER u ON r.TUTEE_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE r.TUTOR_ID = #{tutorId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TUTOR_CLASS SET TUTEE_ID = #{tuteeId} WHERE CLASS_DATE = #{classDate} and CLASS_TIME = #{classTime};
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, interest1, interest2 FROM USER WHERE user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT u.user_id, u.name, u.interest1, u.interest2, t.nationality, t.profileImg, t.like FROM USER u INNER JOIN TUTOR_INFO t ON u.user_id = t.tutor_id WHERE (interest1 = #{interest1} and interest2 = #{interest2}) or (interest1 = #{interest2} and interest2 = #{interest1}) ORDER BY t.like DESC LIMIT 6
